mapper.insert: insert into course (id, local1, local2, subway_nm, level, storage, distance, description, rcmnd_reason, img_url, del_yn, create_dt) values (#{id}, #{local1}, #{local2}, #{subwayNm}, #{level}, #{storage}, #{distance}, #{description}, #{rcmndReason}, #{imgUrl}, #{delYn}, now());
mapper.select: select idx, id, local1, local2, subway_nm, level, storage, distance, description, rcmnd_reason, img_url, del_yn, create_dt, update_dt from course where 1=1 AND id = #{id}
